How do you get the subtitles working?

Subtitles worked for me in my video player, but my dvd maker can't use .idx and .sub format subtitles. I found some that would work, .srt format. If you guys want them, you can find them here:

http://www.sub-titles.net/en/ppodnapisi/podnapis/i/815039/evangerion-shin-gekij-ban-ha-2009-subtitles

Hope they help, they worked for me. They are also a little more visible than the white subtitles that came with this file.

Tried the subtitles that came with the torrent and also the files suggested by users and all I'm getting is Chinese text. Can someone explain why these English subtitles are showing up as Chinese on my system?

The subtitles worked for me after I extracted it from the .rar file in the subs folder. They're easily to read in full screen however they do have some minor miss translations/grammar error. The english audio is very soft though.. I keep having to turn up the volume just to hear them. Overall the video and audio is great.

People experiencing the chinese text. I use VLC Media Player. There are 3 subtitles and it seems the video is set to default chinese subtitles. However there is english, you just need to go to video and select it.
